dashboard.about.title: Casanet Project
dashboard.about.body.text: Control Smart Home IoT devices in your local network without giving anyone access to the house network.
dashboard.appbar.use.home.network.on.tip: All the communication is directly to the local server using home network only, click again to enable back the cloud services fro our-of-home access
dashboard.appbar.use.home.network.off.ti: Click to disable cloud services and use home network only
dashboard.toolbar.remote.connection.auth: Authorization to the remote server failed
dashboard.toolbar.change.password.alert: Your password is insecure, please change it ASAP
dashboard.toolbar.pages.minions.create.m: Open the create new minion view
Refresh minion by force fetching them again from the server
Reread all minions status without re-scanning the network first
Reread all minions status with re-scanning the network first
Refresh devices view by forcing fetching them again from the server (without scanning network)
Scan local network to detect networks changes (new devices, IP changes, etc.)
dashboard.toolbar.pages.users.refresh.ti: Force refetch all users from server

dashboard.minions.edit.name: Edit name
dashboard.minions.redo.status.tip: Re-send current status, used to verify physical device status
dashboard.minions.sync.status.tip: Sync with the physical device status
dashboard.minions.advanced.settings.auto: Set timeout for auto turn off, once the minion turned on
dashboard.minions.advanced.settings.sync: Sync status in a defined activation time
Set simple sync mode, check physical status each activation
Lock ON status, and set ON each activation
Lock OFF status, and set OFF each activation
dashboard.minions.advanced.settings.lock: Set dashboard lock, allow modify status by Casanet dashboard only
dashboard.minions.advanced.settings.sync: Set rotation mode, rotate status each activation
dashboard.minions.advanced.settings.fetc: Fetch commands sets for minion from the commands repository
Fetch all available commands sets for selection
There is an issue in the command repository
dashboard.minions.advanced.settings.reco: Record/generate a command as the current configured status command
Enter the device to record mode, send a command using original remote, the command will be stored as the command of current configured status command
dashboard.minions.advanced.settings.gene: Generate a random command and store the generated command as the current configured status command

dashboard.timings.timeout.start.in.label: Start countdown in
dashboard.timings.timeout.minutes.label: Countdown minutes
dashboard.timings.set.lock.by.timing.tip: Set a lock to allow modifying the minion status by the dashboard only on the timing activation, once it's set, the lock can be removed by other timings or manually on the minion's Advances Settings->Sync status
dashboard.timings.delete.timing.alert.te: Are you sure you want to delete the timing? this action can't be undone
dashboard.actions.default.name: Action
dashboard.actions.action.name: Action name
dashboard.actions.action.apply.on.tip: Apply action trigger, select status change to trigger action on status changed only, or permanent to force the action's set statuses anytime the trigger status is match
dashboard.actions.action.apply.status.ch: Trigger action set statuses only one minion's status change
dashboard.actions.action.apply.permanent: Force the action's set statuses anytime the trigger status is match
The status that will trigger the action
dashboard.actions.action.set.statuses.ti: A collection of minion/s with a status to them for them once the action will be triggered

dashboard.settings.general.backup.server: Download the entire server data the minions timings settings etc. it contains sensitive data so keep it safe.
dashboard.settings.general.logs.download: Download the server logs, pay attention that logs can contain sensitive information so keep it safe
dashboard.settings.general.update.server: PAY ATTENTION! updating version may be a risk! please notice, the updating process can take a while, do not power off anything during version update.
dashboard.settings.general.update.commit: Go to the server source code commit
dashboard.settings.general.update.alread: Your server is already on the latest version
dashboard.settings.interface.lightweight: The lightweight dashboard for old phones or very slow networks (only ~20KB of resources).
dashboard.settings.interface.v3.dashboar: The old V3 dashboard, The old V3 dashboard, maintaining for security and fatal bug fixes only.
dashboard.settings.interface.explorer.ap: Explorer the Casanet openapi V3 API using the Swagger UI
dashboard.settings.connectivity.show.reg: Registered users are the only users with the ability to access the server through the remote server
Are you sure you want to unregister the user {{user}} from the remote server? after un-registration, the user will be required to re-register in order to use the remote server to access the server.
dashboard.settings.connectivity.show.phy: The server physical (MAC) address is used to identify the local server in the remote server and is also used as the default password, this is highly sensitive information, keep it safe.
dashboard.settings.connectivity.edit.con: Set remote server URL and authentication key
dashboard.settings.connectivity.edit.rem: Allow remote server to fetch logs
Allow remote server to fetch logs for debugging issues, if you disable this, the remote server will not be allowed to access the local server logs
dashboard.settings.connectivity.disconne: Disconnect the local server from the remote server
Are you sure you want to disconnect from the remote server? after disconnecting, connecting will require a new authentication key.
dashboard.v3.redirect.under.construction: We are working hard to complete this component as soon as possible.
In the meanwhile please click <1>here</1> to be redirected to the legacy V3 dashboard.
